text: Donald John Rollo (March 11, 1887 - April 13, 1948) was a Canadian curler. He was the third of the 1929 Brier Champion team (skipped by Gordon Hudson), representing Manitoba.Winnipeg Free Press, Friday, April 16, 1948, Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada, pg 18"Obituaries", Winnipeg Free Press, Saturday, April 17, 1948, Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada ==References== Category:Brier champions Category:1887 births Category:1948 deaths Category:Curlers from Manitoba Category:English emigrants to Canada Category:Sportspeople from London Category:Canadian male curlers
title: Don Rollo
